title: Personal Portfolio Website
description: A responsive portfolio website built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Features dark mode support and dynamic content loading.

title: E-commerce Platform
description: Full-stack e-commerce solution with React frontend and Node.js backend. Includes shopping cart, user authentication, and payment processing.

title: Task Management App
description: A Kanban-style task management application built with Vue.js and Firebase. Features real-time updates and team collaboration.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: Interactive weather dashboard using OpenWeather API. Displays current conditions and 5-day forecast with dynamic updates.

title: Social Media Analytics Tool
description: Data visualization tool for social media metrics using D3.js. Provides insights through interactive charts and graphs.

title: Chat Application
description: Real-time chat application using Socket.io and Express. Features private messaging and file sharing capabilities.

title: Budget Tracker
description: Personal finance management tool with expense categorization and budget planning features. Built with React and MongoDB.

title: Recipe Manager
description: Digital recipe management system with ingredient scaling and meal planning features. Uses PostgreSQL for data storage.

title: Fitness Tracking App
description: Mobile-first fitness tracking application with workout planning and progress visualization. Built using React Native.

title: Content Management System
description: Custom CMS built with PHP and MySQL. Features user roles, content versioning, and media management.

title: Music Streaming Service
description: Spotify-like music streaming platform with playlist creation and social features. Uses AWS S3 for media storage.

title: Educational Platform
description: Online learning platform with course management, video lectures, and progress tracking. Built with Django and React.
